Contoso IT Acceptable Use Policy

Version: 3.1
Effective Date: January 2024

OVERVIEW

This document sets forth the acceptable use policy for all Contoso information 
technology resources, including computers, networks, email, and cloud services.

SCOPE

This policy applies to all employees, contractors, and third-party users who
access Contoso IT resources.

KEY REQUIREMENTS

1. Email Usage
   - Company email is for business purposes
   - Do not send sensitive data without encryption
   - Report suspected phishing to security@contoso.com

2. Internet Usage
   - Streaming media should be limited during business hours
   - Downloading unauthorized software is prohibited
   - VPN must be used when accessing company resources remotely

3. Device Security
   - Lock your workstation when away (Win+L or Cmd+Ctrl+Q)
   - Enable full-disk encryption on all devices
   - Keep operating systems and applications updated

4. Data Classification
   - Public: General information, marketing materials
   - Internal: Business documents, process guides
   - Confidential: Financial data, HR records, PII
   - Restricted: Trade secrets, security credentials

VIOLATIONS

Violations of this policy may result in disciplinary action up to and
including termination of employment.

Contact: it-security@contoso.com
